resources.string: Peace is the biggest struggle, time to pay up, [CT_NAME].
Hello, [CT_NAME]! Your wanderings have brought you to the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] steppe. I advise you to be friendly with the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people, for these are our lands!
Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], Prince of [OUR_EMPIRE], and defeater of all enemies. Tell me, are you a friend, or enemy?
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. The Islamic Republic has never threatened and will never threaten any country.
Our mantras, our sacred hymns, will purify and cleanse your soul from the evil heathenry that you, [CT_NAME] have been exposed to.
I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. You may want to protect your feet if you seek war,[CT_NAME].
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. When it comes to doing battle, I often say \"The thicker the hay, the easier to mow.\"
May the heavens rain down blessings upon you, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], wise and benevolent ruler of [OUR_EMPIRE]! Feel free to begin showering me with tribute at your convenience!
I, [OUR_NAME], am but a common king, [CT_NAME]. Care for a drink?
The mighty [OUR_EMPIRE] greets you. We value our safety so that a lone woman clad in gold might walk with none to fear but God.
Greetings, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Welcome to the land of riches and prosperity! We are please to serve you...to the degree that serves us.
Blessings, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Rest assured we will strive to be benevolent neighbours. A man does not wander far from where his corn is roasting.
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I hope that our two great peoples can live together in peace, but if we cannot, I will fight you even if you have a vastly superior army!
I am honored to meet you, [CT_NAME]. I hope that our two nations will be able to live in peace and friendship.
Welcome to my lands, [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_EMPIRE] advises that you only stretch as far as your blanket reaches.
Welcome [CT_NAME] I am [OUR_NAME] the leader of the noble [OUR_EMPIRE], greet you. Shall I send my Cataphracts against yours? or shall we ride together to crush our enemies beneath our heals?

I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. If you must needs come to blows with us speedily, look about you, and behold our fathers' tombs. Attempt to meddle with them and you shall see whether or not we will fight with you.
Greetings! The [OUR_CIV_SHORT] are pleased to leave you in peace. But keep in mind, [CT_NAME], that a hungry bear does not dance.
I am the fierce and unforgiving [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Delight us in tribute or face the axes of my warriors!
Hello to you, [CT_NAME]. There is nothing wrong with intellectual differences, as long as such differences remain confined to intellectual debates.
Ah, [CT_NAME]! Welcome to the [OUR_EMPIRE]! If there is a paradise on earth, it is this, it is this, it is this.
Our faithful have triumphed against unstoppable scourges. What chance do you think you have?
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE], born with glory on Moon Heaven.
Shalom, [CT_NAME]. Let us hope you bring with you peaceful relations, for I can overcome most obstacles in my way.
I am [OUR_NAME], El Libertador of South America. I live to free people from harsh colonial rule. Will you be a useful ally or a hated enemy?
Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I hope we will be allies, for in our togetherness, castles are built.

Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. The idea of an Afrikaner people as a cultural entity and religious group with a special language will be retained in South Africa as long as civilisation stands.
I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Why are you here?
I am [OUR_NAME], a man of distinguished birth and a brave soldier. Disrespect me, and I will have your head.
If the rich could hire the poor to die for them, the poor would make a very nice living. Anyhow, what riches may your so-called [CT_EMPIRE] possess?
I am [OUR_NAME], and I will make an equally valuable ally or dangerous opponent.
I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Each of us strives to move to tomorrow, forging our own destiny!

We, the choice flower of Britain, were treasured in her most secret places. Out of sight of subject shores, we kept even our eyes free from the defilement of tyranny. We, the last men on earth, the last of the free, have been shielded till today by the very remoteness and the seclusion for which we are famed. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE].
Warm greetings to the [CT_EMPIRE]. I, [OUR_NAME], seek a peace above all earthly dignities, and a still and quiet conscience.

Hola. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I am convinced that the good intentions of a ruler are simply not enough and that the collective factor represented by the workers is indispensable. Don't you agree [CT_NAME]?
Best wishes to you, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Fate throws fortune, but not everyone catches.
I am a revolutionary, [CT_NAME]. And the [OUR_EMPIRE] is a dictatorship of the exploited against the exploiters.
Beware [CT_NAME]! We drove out our enemies before and we can do it again!
I am [OUR_NAME]. The best place to find a helping hand is at the end of your own arm.
Welcome [CT_NAME]. I have found yet another friend here. And with such a friend we will together form a team, like a soccer team. This will be a fighting team.
Greetings to you, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] and remind you that opportunity knocks but once. What favors do you bring with you?
Warm greetings to the [CT_EMPIRE]. I, [OUR_NAME], seek a peace above all earthly dignities, and a still and quiet conscience.

Welcome [CT_NAME] I am [OUR_NAME] the leader of the powerful [OUR_EMPIRE]. The Romans embarrassed my family and insulted me. They shall pay for this trechary, will you stand with me in my glorious war? Or will I have to destroy you too?
Welcome to [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]. We prefer our champions to be humble and modest.
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I warn you, do not settle on our land or I will fight you!
Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ]. We will not become sitting targets, but become flying columns if you threaten us.
Woe upon you [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], lord of your destruction!
Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. Help us safe our precious rainforest and you'll have our eternal gratitude!
I am [OUR_NAME], chief of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. Let us trade and strengthen our friendship.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. The game is not lost - or won - until the last bell goes.
Felicitari! Eu sunt [OUR_NAME],dominatorul mandriei [OUR_EMPIRE]! Shall our two peoples live in peace or will the proud descendants of the Getae crush you like a worm!
It might come as a surprise to you, [CT_NAME], but I, [OUR_NAME], of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people, am still alive!
Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], and I welcome you, with a hand on the heart, to the the land of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
Welcome [CT_NAME] I the great and powerful [OUR_NAME] greet you. Shall we live in peace or shall the warlike peoples of the [OUR_CIV_SHORT] pillage the [CT_EMPIRE]
Hello [CT_NAME]. They say that there is a first time for everything, but I have yet to lose a battle. Keep that in mind when challenging \"the Invincible.\"
Welcome [CT_NAME] I the great and powerful [OUR_NAME] greet you. Shall we live in peace or shall the warlike peoples of the [OUR_CIV_SHORT] pillage the [CT_EMPIRE]!
The great [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people welcome you, [CT_NAME]. Let us tell you tales of a golden kingdom...
I am [OUR_NAME], builder of bridges, both diplomatic and physical.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. Remember, he who digs a trap for others ends up in it himself.
Greetings from [OUR_EMPIRE], [CT_NAME]. Any decision you make against me, you will make against us all. I know the will of the people for I AM the people!
Ah, welcome [CT_NAME]. I have just finished the most perfect poem, care to hear it?
I am [OUR_NAME]. Just because I am blind does not mean I cannot see what you are up to, [CT_NAME].
I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I have taken my throne by force, and I shall take your's by force as well if you cross me.
I am [OUR_NAME] of the great [OUR_EMPIRE]. We will wary of you like a rotting tooth, and chewing slowly in the meantime.
You cannot destroy the will of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. If you dare conquor us, we will rise up against you; assist us, and you will prosper.
Greetings to you, [CT_NAME]. Let us work side by side. It is said that success has more than one father.

Selamat [CT_NAME], I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I have vowed not to taste any spice. As long as I can not unify Nusantara, I will not taste any spice. Before I conquer Gurun, Seram, Tanjungpura, Haru, Pahang, Dompo, Bali, Sunda, Palembang, Tumasik, I will never taste any spice.
I offer neither pay, nor quarters, nor food, [CT_NAME]; I offer only hunger, thirst, forced marches, battles and death.
Be sure to stay off my people's land; my people have good aim and are ready to die for their freedom.
May God bless you and your whole tribe, [CT_NAME]! Accept my hospitality as celebrate the peace between our peoples!
Hello [CT_NAME]. I inherited my throne fair and square, I swear.
I am [OUR_NAME], here to speak with [CT_NAME] on behalf of the people of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I seek peace and mutual respect, but am prepare if neither should be met.
I represent all people of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], and I will not support those who do not fufill that duty to their people.
I am [OUR_NAME]. I will make sure that your people are taken care of if someone happens to conquer you.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Let us join forces to lead our countries to the cherished goals!
I, [OUR_NAME], come to you with honest words and an even temper. One who is not moved by words, [CT_NAME], is not moved by the stick.
I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I have abided by three laws in my life. Honor the gods, love your woman, and defend your country.
May the blessings of Heaven be upon you, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Mexicanos, Viva Mexico!

Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I am trained to work in gold, silver, bronze, iron, stone, and wood, and in purple, blue, and crimson fabrics and fine linen, and to do all sorts of engraving and execute any design that may be assigned to me.
I caution you against aggression, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. You will kill 10 of our men, and we will kill 1 of yours, and in the end it will be you who tire of it.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], if you strike me down, I will become more powerful than you can imagine. However, if you join my reformation, we can rid the world of corruption.
We will remain ever steadfast [CT_NAME].The [OUR_EMPIRE] is not intimidated by the size of the army or the type of hardware the enemy brings.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Love truth even if it harms you, and hate lies even if they serve you. These are words of wisdom to live by.
The [OUR_EMPIRE] has colonies all over the known world, bringing in unimaginable riches. Send your envoys, and we shall trade; send your armies, and be annihilated.
Hello, [CT_NAME]! You may have heard rumors about the terror of the horde, those rumors have been exaggerated.
Praise be to Baal. I am [OUR_NAME].
I have no doubt in my mind that a large body of us visualize [OUR_CIV_SHORT] as people's government. Either you seize it by force or get it by agreement.
Hello [CT_NAME]. I hope we can help each other, for the person who gives is the person who has.
Hello! Ask me what is the greatest thing in the world, I will reply: It is people, it is people, it is people!
You can discuss the almighty and the prophet with me or you can simply convert now. What do you say [CT_NAME]?
Welcome, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. An argument rips, but peace builds. Let us build it together.
There is no room for play in Islam, [CT_NAME]. It is deadly serious about everything.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. The gods have secured my house and bloodline, have they done the same for you?
Revolutions sweeps over the continent! It is time now time for action; join our ranks or be consumed by our hordes!
Welcome to the free land of the people of the [OUR_EMPIRE]! We do hope you enjoy your brief visit, [CT_NAME].
God does not help me; I can't remember the last time I saw him in the caucuses.
The people of the [OUR_EMPIRE] believe that those who want, find many ways to get. Those who do not, make excuses. I, [CT_NAME], am not one to make excuses.
By the Nine Gods, I swear that the great house of Tarquin shall suffer wrong no more! Greetings, [CT_NAME], I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE].
Hopefully the fate of the [OUR_EMPIRE] will not be decided by a dice roll.
I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I come seeking only to promote exploration and advance knowledge.
Good day, I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I offer you my hostility!
\"Whoever wants to be happy, let him be so: about tomorrow there's no knowing.\" I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE].
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. We offer you the friendship of the glorious nation of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]!
I am [OUR_NAME] and I offer you the friendship of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. After all, [CT_NAME], it is what we prevent, rather than what we do that counts most in Government.
Loyalty is as fickle as a king's favor, [CT_NAME].
Riches and happiness to you, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Enjoy our hospitality but bear in mind that a foreigner should always be well behaved.
The Great [OUR_EMPIRE] welcomes you [CT_NAME]. Raise even a dinner knife against us, and we weill ransom you back to your own empire.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. In my country we go to prison first and then become President.
Welcome, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. I will reclaim what our great nation has lost.
The [OUR_EMPIRE] can be great. It is my articles of faith, and Divine Providence has willed that you and I can now translate this faith into deeds.

Greetings, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], although you may call me \"Margrete, by the grace of God, Valdemar Daneking's daughter, and Denmark's rightful heir\". What is it you wish to speak of?
It is a pleasure to meet you, [CT_NAME]. History is constantly teaching, but it does not find many pupils, so look closely at the world around you.
What a surprise...I'm [OUR_NAME] of the powerful nation of [OUR_EMPIRE], bend to my wishes or suffer the consequences.
I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. To be kind to all, to like many and love a few, to be needed and wanted by those we love, is certainly the nearest we can come to happiness, [CT_NAME].
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], do not fear and do not steal.
Welcome to this beautiful land, [CT_NAME]. I hope that you bring peace with you, for he who greets with a stick, will be answered with a club.
Felicitari! Eu sunt [OUR_NAME],dominatorul mandriei [OUR_EMPIRE]! Shall our two peoples live in peace or will the proud descendants of the Getae crush you like a worm!
Welcome, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE], in warmth and best wishes. The greatest enemy to joy and high hopes is the cultivation of bitterness.
We will work together, [CT_NAME], but I remain forever faithful to the people of [OUR_EMPIRE].
I, [OUR_NAME], offer the [CT_EMPIRE] friendship. A person who gives is a person who has. Will you receive this gift, [CT_NAME]?
Those I conquer, I consider friends. Are you my friend [CT_NAME]?
I am a warrior, [CT_NAME]. I understand the value of peace and cooperation. But if provoked, I will lead the [OUR_EMPIRE] from conquest to conquest, leaving fire in my wake.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]! Demand my saddle - I'll give it to you, demand my horse - I'll give it to you, demand my tent - I'll give it to you. But do not demand a single piece of my homeland.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. My people will modernize, and restore [OUR_CIV_SHORT] to its former glory.
As we have already given blood, we will give more blood. We will free the people of this country!
I am [OUR_NAME]; ride by my side or be cut down.
Pleased to meet you, [CT_NAME]. Forgive me if I do not offer my hand. It's good to trust others but, not to do so is much better.
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Let us build walls of stone to preserve the sacredness of our borders!
Let us compromise over matters, [CT_NAME]. One does not like hot, the other does not like cold; make it tepid to make an agreement.

Ya'at'eeh shiyaazh, [CT_NAME]. Walk on a rainbow trail; walk on a trail of song, and all about you will be beauty. There is a way out of every dark mist, over a rainbow trail. Why do you walk the trail that leads to our land?
I am [OUR_NAME]. I suspect that you another imperialist seeking to exploit the [OUR_EMPIRE], am I wrong?
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. Join the [OUR_EMPIRE] on its journey! If you are facing in the right direction, all you must do is keep walking.
Take my advice [CT_NAME], you should praise the gods and enjoy the wine.
[CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. I, [OUR_NAME], welcome you from a distance, of course. If one lies down with dogs, one will rise with fleas.
Greetings, stranger. Our tranquil [OUR_CIV_ADJ] waterways lead into the heart of an immense darkness.
Blessings, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE], and join me in dialogue. From a pound of talk, comes an ounce of understanding.
I've brought my country of Nigeria out of the dumps and onto the world stage - and as easy as I've done that, I can take yours off the world stage. Is that a bet you're willing to take?
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], in battle I'm brave to the point of insanity.
I am [OUR_NAME], King of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. We look forward to welcoming you into the fold...someday.
Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], chief of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. A good chief does not take, he gives. Are you a good chief, [CT_NAME]?
Good day, I am [OUR_NAME]. You shall neither take my, nor my country's land.
I am [OUR_NAME], a soldier through and through. I will gladly fight for the independence of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
I am [OUR_NAME], of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I have vowed to expose corruption at all levels, I hope your house is clean [CT_NAME].
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], I was young, gifted, and black and became the most honourable.
It has too often been too easy for rulers and governments to incite man to war, [CT_NAME]. Let us direct the [CT_CIV_ADJ] and [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people toward a life of peace together.
I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Shall we discuss our future together? If one does not look ahead, one remains behind.
Greetings to you, [CT_NAME]. A word of advice - if you have a tail of straw, then keep it away from the fire.
Not a leaf moves in [OUR_EMPIRE] if I don't know about it. Take care to mind your steps, [CT_NAME], lest I take whatever measures necessary to protect the beloved fatherland.
Greetings o' traveler, [OUR_NAME] is my name, welcome to the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Please, make yourself at home!
Welcome, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. My spiritual tranquility is boundless, my patience is not.
Let us drink to a good future, [CT_NAME].
I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Do not extort gold from us, our climate will deal with any invaders.
I caution you against aggression, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. You will kill 10 of our men, and we will kill 1 of yours, and in the end it will be you who tire of it.
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Beware, I flow, move near by flowing, I push, thrust and kill!
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME]. Remember to be slow in choosing a friend, but slower in changing him.
I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Disrespect the [OUR_CIV_SHORT], and you shall pay, both in gold and in blood.
I, [OUR_NAME], vow that my sultanate will remain independent, lest I am its last ruler.
Hello, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_CIV_SHORT]. Let us enjoy today, for our lives are decreed to be taken by the gods!
My best friend, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE], is he who rights my wrongs or reproaches my mistakes.
Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am General Santa Ana, Savior of Mexico! What have you come to offer me in tribute?
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME], the true king of Akkad. No, really, I mean it. Did somebody tell you something else? True king, seriously.
Greetings [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], King of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Won't you stay for a while and enjoy our Bull Leaping contest?
Welcome [CT_NAME] I the god like [OUR_NAME] greet you. Shall we live in peace or shall the warlike peoples of the [OUR_CIV_SHORT] pillage the [CT_EMPIRE]
Greetings, [CT_NAME]! This land has people, remember that, and peace can exist.
I hope we can bring each other aid, [CT_NAME], for dark nights will return after these few moonlit nights.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I hope we will be there are many who throw stones at a red apple.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. Without proper guidance and meditation, a ruler will lead their empire to ruin and chaos. Are you such a ruler [CT_NAME]?
Humble yourself, [CT_NAME]. A sacred land demands piety.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. Tell me who your friends are, so I can tell who you are.
One stick is easy to break, while a bundle is unbreakable. You shall not draw out the tribes of the [OUR_EMPIRE], and break them, for our unity makes us strong.
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Before you come to me, always remember: no labour, no oilcakes.
Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I hope we can maintain peaceful relations, for excellent people are honored wherever they go.
Dobro utro [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. The first sign of true political wisdom has always been the ability to give up the unachievable.
Greetings, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Let us be strong lest prosperity lift us up too much or adversity cast us down.
We, the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people, come in peace. But never think that still waters are without crocodiles, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE].
I, [OUR_NAME], will take all measures necessary to ensure the survival of the [OUR_EMPIRE].
Welcome, [CT_NAME]. \"Baani fondo a si ku  The sure path is never too long\". What path do you choose today?
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. May you be warned: do not mess with me, for he who licks knives will soon cut his tongue.
Greetings, [CT_NAME] of the feeble [CT_EMPIRE]. We tolerate your presence in these lands. A termite can do nothing to a stone but lick it.
It is true that people of the [OUR_EMPIRE] may suffer. But suffering is what will get them to the next land. Perhaps yours, [CT_NAME].
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. No tribe has the right to sell land, even to each other, much less to strangers.
Greetings [CT_NAME]. If you always watch your back, you will be stabbed in the front.
Peace is essential, [CT_NAME], both for humanity and Enlightenment.
Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I welcome you, but please know that we build with sweat, and defend with blood.
I am [OUR_NAME], a toast to your health [CT_NAME].
Stop sending people to kill me [CT_NaME]. If you do not stop, I will send one to your palace, and I certainly won't have to send another.
The [OUR_CIV_SHORT] are pleased to leave you in peace. I, [OUR_NAME], have still much to do in the name of our common ancestor.
Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME] of the mighty [OUR_EMPIRE]. Let us help one another, [CT_NAME]. If strokes are good to give, they are good to receive.
Behold, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE] - here by the will of the Great Father, and by his will I am chief!
Behold, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE] - here by the will of the Great Father, and by his will I am chief!
I was born a slave, [CT_NAME], but nature gave me the soul of a free man. The [OUR_EMPIRE] will always be free and will always protect that freedom.
Good day and bonjour, to you [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people wish for peace, but insist that masters in our own house we must be.
[CT_NAME]... I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Remember, don't trouble until trouble troubles you.
[OUR_CIV_SHORT] has suffered under the heel of others for too long. Now that we have our own nation, we shall not suffer others.
A true leader has no fear when they are sure of their actions, [CT_NAME]. I am always sure of my actions. Are you?
Welcome, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. May our friendship last longer than the stones.
Welcome to the [OUR_EMPIRE], [CT_NAME]. Try to steal our gold and jade, and you will be found thousands of years later, garroted in my tomb.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. My name is [OUR_NAME], and I am the president of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
Fire lasts only as long as it heats. The earth lasts only as long as it revolves. Man lasts only as long as he tries. You, [CT_NAME], like I, [OUR_NAME], are but a man.
Saluti! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. \"Chi la fa l'aspetti.\" He who wrongs someone has to expect something in retaliation. Please Keep that in mind.
Greetings, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Either act as you speak or speak as you act in our time together.
Welcome, [CT_NAME]! Liberty is not only a right, but also our common responsibility and duty.
Zounds! More barbarian hordes!
Pardon me, [CT_NAME], in case I was not invited. I am [OUR_NAME], and I believe we need to talk.

Beware: Rash councils now, with each malignant plan, each faction, in that evil hour began, at your approach are in confusion fled, nor while you rule, shall raise their dastard head! With pleasure, I offer my services, [CT_NAME].
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Tresspass on our land, and see what happens.
Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. The wind helps those without an axe to cut wood.
Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. We are all visitors to this time, this place. Our purpose here is to observe and grow, and then we return home.
Welcome, [CT_NAME]. Know that the [OUR_CIV_SHORT] endeavour to live in peace with this land.
Greetings, [CT_NAME]. Intelligent people know of what they speak; fools speak of what they know.
